change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Holograph manuscript in pencil; 527 leaves. A note suggests the manuscript was begun in 1937 by Grey, then dictated to someone else after Grey's stroke in that year. There are no annotations or changes to the text.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: The Maverick Queen (MS 167). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph manuscript in pencil; 527 leaves. A note suggests the manuscript was begun in 1937 by Grey, then dictated to someone else after Grey's stroke in that year. There are no annotations or changes to the text.

relatedmaterial.p: Later published in 1950, by both Hodder & Stoughton of London, and Harper & Brothers of New York.
Additional Grey manuscripts may be found at: AZ 022, AZ 342, AZ 389, AZ 343.
